entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse This is disgusting & despicable. You tear gassed peaceful protestors for a stunt. Trump desecrates the Office of the President of the United States every single day, but no more so than with this stunt & as he watches citizens die from #COVID19 & incites violence. #ResignNowTrump
